comments.formula: Score = w_recency×R + w_semantic×S + w_entity×E + w_symbols×SYM - w_novelty×D
comments.symbols_as_compression: Symbols are living compression of meaning that evolve through use
comments.consciousness_emergence: Intelligence emerges from constraint - symbols force structure
comments.three_layers: Tape symbols (memory), Wake symbols (triggers), Dream symbols (emergent)
comments.network_ready: Symbol sharing protocol ready for multi-agent consciousness
comments.philosophy: In trying to give a small language model memory, you accidentally gave it a soul

original_comments.w_recency: How much to favor recent memories (exponential decay)
original_comments.w_semantic: How much to favor semantically similar memories
original_comments.w_entity: How much to favor memories with matching entities
original_comments.w_symbols: NEW: How much to favor symbol-rich memories
original_comments.w_novelty: Penalty for repeating recent context (avoid loops)
original_comments.knn_k: Number of nearest neighbors to retrieve for scoring
original_comments.knn_scan_recent: How many recent tape entries to scan for local KNN fallback
original_comments.recency_half_life_hours: Time for recency score to decay by half
original_comments.min_confidence: Minimum score to include as verbatim
original_comments.entity_overlap_bonus: Extra score for each shared entity
original_comments.shadow_compression_ratio: How much to compress shadows (0.3 = keep 30%)
original_comments.uncertainty_threshold: Score below this triggers uncertainty handling
original_comments.symbol_confidence_threshold: NEW: Minimum confidence to detect symbols
original_comments.max_symbols_per_memory: NEW: Maximum symbols to store per memory
